Text.Page:
What a gula doesn't eat, it enslaves. And after a while, the slaves wish they'd been chosen for the butcher's block instead.

If we take out enough {@LinkCreature:8#2031#gula slavers} and {@LinkCreature:8#2041#taskmasters}, we'll cut their slavery operation off at the knees!

That's worth a little risk, don't you think?
Nicely done, <PCNAME>. There's enough cruelty in the world without the gulas adding to it.
Slavery doesn't bother you? Not even a little?
